bookables.title: Meeting Room
bookables.notes: The one with the big table and interactive screen. Seats 12. See Colin if you need the tea and coffee trolley.

bookables.title: Lecture Hall
bookables.notes: For more formal 'sage-on-the-stage' presentations. Seats 100. See Sandra for help with AV setup.

bookables.title: Games Room
bookables.notes: Table tennis, table football, pinball! There's also a selection of board games. Please tidy up!

bookables.title: Lounge
bookables.notes: A relaxing place to hang out. Ideal for bean bag wranglers and sofa surfers. Help yourself to a beer after hours.

bookables.title: Projector
bookables.notes: Portable but powerful. Keep it with the case. Be careful, it gets quite hot after a while!

bookables.title: Wireless mics
bookables.notes: Really handy but don't forget to switch them off when you pop out of the room.
